front.title: An Algorithm for Computing Maximally Redundant Trees for IP/LDP Fast-Reroute

abstract.t: A solution for IP and LDP Fast-Reroute using Maximally Redundant Trees is presented in draft-ietf-rtgwg-mrt-frr-architecture. This document defines the associated MRT Lowpoint algorithm that is used in the Default MRT profile to compute both the necessary Maximally Redundant Trees with their associated next-hops and the alternates to select for MRT-FRR.
